Package ohos.ai.asr

Interface AsrListener


  • public interface AsrListener
    Provides callbacks for observing the process and result of ASR method calls.

    The caller determines how to implement this interface when using AsrClient#init(AsrIntent, AsrListener) to initialize the ASR engine.

    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • onInit

        void onInit​(PacMap params)
        Called when the ASR engine is initialized.

        After the ASR engine is initialized by using AsrClient#init(AsrIntent, AsrListener), the ASR engine server invokes this callback to process the initialization result data. The caller determines how to implement this callback.

        Parameters:
        params - Indicates the initialization result data represented by a key-value pair. The key is the string "error_code", and the value is a result code defined in AsrError.
        Since:
        3

      • onBeginningOfSpeech

        void onBeginningOfSpeech​()
        Called when the ASR engine detects that a user starts to speak.
        Since:
        3

      • onRmsChanged

        void onRmsChanged​(float rms)
        Called when the ASR engine detects any changes to the root mean square (RMS) energy of the input audio.

        The ASR server invokes this callback to process the RMS energy.

        Parameters:
        rms - Indicates the RMS energy. The value is proportional to the RMS energy.
        Since:
        3

      • onBufferReceived

        void onBufferReceived​(byte[] buffer)
        Called when the ASR engine receives a new audio stream.

        This callback is invoked to process the received audio stream. Based on the callback result, the caller can observe whether the ASR server has received any audio input.

        Parameters:
        buffer - Indicates the audio stream received by the ASR server.
        Since:
        3

      • onEndOfSpeech

        void onEndOfSpeech​()
        Called when the ASR engine detects that the user stops speaking.
        Since:
        3

      • onError

        void onError​(int error)
        Called when an error occurs during ASR.
        Parameters:
        error - Indicates the ASR error code.
        Since:
        3
        See Also:
        AsrError

      • onResults

        void onResults​(PacMap results)
        Called when the ASR engine delivers the finally parsed speech recognition results. This callback is invoked to return and process the results.
        Parameters:
        results - Indicates the ASR results represented by key-value pairs. For the possible keywords in the results, see AsrResultKey.
        Since:
        3

      • onIntermediateResults

        void onIntermediateResults​(PacMap intermediateResults)
        Called when the ASR engine delivers intermediate speech recognition results. This callback is invoked to return and process the results.

        This callback may be invoked at any time between invocations of onBeginningOfSpeech() and onResults(ohos.utils.PacMap).

        Parameters:
        intermediateResults - Indicates the intermediate ASR results represented by key-value pairs. For the possible keywords in the results, see AsrResultKey.
        Since:
        3

      • onEnd

        void onEnd​()
        Called when the ASR ends.

        If speech recognition is interrupted due to invocation of AsrClient#stopListening() or AsrClient#cancel(), this callback will not be invoked.

        Since:
        3

      • onEvent

        void onEvent​(int eventType,
             PacMap params)
        Called when the ASR engine detects certain events to report them to the caller.

        This callback is used for monitoring scenarios not specified by particular callbacks.

        Parameters:
        eventType - Indicates the event type, as defined in AsrEvent.
        params - Indicates event-specific results represented by key-value pairs, which vary according to event types.
        Since:
        3

      • onAudioStart

        void onAudioStart​()
        Called when the audio starts.
        Since:
        3

      • onAudioEnd

        void onAudioEnd​()
        Called when the audio ends.
        Since:
        3
